name: XETA
description: The $XETA project generates passive income through our XŌN product, which is a collection of 10 $XETA tokens. As a combined group of $XETA tokens, each XŌN offers the purchaser the opportunity to generate additional tokens. XETA Capital aims to accentuate the positive features of DeFi and TradFi to create a stable DeFi project with roots in traditional finance opportunities. We are marrying revenue-generating on- and off-chain projects, traditional finance resources, and our passive income-generating $XETA Project to provide our clients with a variety of revenue opportunities, features, and benefits. Generate long-term, intelligent, sustainable revenue for our clients and our company, while offering our client community the opportunity to create a long-term wealth management plan for their families.
